sentences.en: a major importer of cotton manufactures
sentences.cn: 棉花产品的主要进口商

sentences.en: Cost will determine the methods of manufacture.

sentences.cn: 甚至工场手工业也不再能满足需要了.

sentences.en: Nitrates are used as preservatives in food manufacture.
sentences.cn: 硝酸盐在食品加工业中被用作防腐剂。

sentences.en: Now they lead in the manufacture of weapons of mass destruction.
sentences.cn: 现在他们在制造大规模杀人武器方面领先.

sentences.en: Small enterprises are suited to top filling in the gaps in the manufacture by large enterprises of complete sets of equipment.
sentences.cn: (小企业为大企业 ) 协作配套

sentences.en: the company that manufactured the drug
The date of manufacture of the jewellery has not been authenticated.
sentences.cn: 这些珠宝的制造日期尚未经证实.

sentences.en: The engineer needs to carefully study the manufacture's data sheets.
sentences.cn: 技术员需要认真研究产品说明书.

sentences.en: The equipment is of our own manufacture.
sentences.cn: 这设备是我们自己制造的.

sentences.en: The factory is now trying to manufacture a new model.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂现正试制一种新产品.

sentences.en: The tin - free steel has been used for the manufacture of beverage cans.
sentences.cn: 无锡钢一直用来制造饮料罐.

sentences.en: They manufacture the class of plastics known as thermoplastic materials.
sentences.cn: 他们生产这类被称为热塑材料的塑料制品。

sentences.en: This is not always true - as with the manufacture of pig iron and steel from low - grade iron ores - but it did lead to the concentration of industrial developments on the coal fields.
sentences.cn: 并非一概如此 — 例如从低级铁矿石中生产生铁和钢材的情况一但是这导致了工业发展集中在煤田上.

sentences.en: We can manufacture high - precision machine tools.
We could not stay in business and manufacture only small cars.
sentences.cn: 要是只制造小型汽车,那我们就不能维持营业.

sentences.en: Zhou Yu ordered Zhuge Liang to manufacture 100,000 arrows within ten days.
sentences.cn: 东吴与刘备联合抗曹,东吴大都督周瑜命诸葛亮十日内制作十万支箭.
